item.title: It’s too good to be true — but you may not believe it. How to listen when investment pros say ‘back off.’
item.description: Losing $150,000 in crypto, being convinced of easy money in real estate, and other dangers from unrealistic expectations.

item.title: My real-estate agent wants me to spend $8,000 on a new driveway. Will that really help sell my house?
item.description: Regardless of which renovations you choose to make, don’t expect them to rapidly reduce how much time your home spends on the market.

item.title: Tesla made a gamble with its latest price cuts. Will it pay off?
item.description: The new ‘standard’ Tesla models might not be priced low enough for consumers to justify the tradeoffs, one expert says.
